chapters.title: Chapter 12: Entering Home
chapters.info: Cetalia Delarme, p. 168—Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah. She is as strong as Moiraine and Siuan will be when they reach full potential. She is tall and square-faced, with steel-gray hair in a multitude of braids to her waist. She is the head of the Blue Ajah eyes-and-ears, the best spy network in the world.
